permissions: User can list site events they are authorized to view per SiteEventPolicy scope: admins, developer members on the job production plan, job production plan inspectors, or users authorized via the related tender job schedule shift policy.
validation_notes: Filters `event-type` accept arrive_site,start_work,stop_work,depart_site,at_site. `event-at-min` and `event-at-max` expect ISO 8601 timestamps. Filters `has-shift`, `most-recent-by-shift`, and `most-recent-by-driver-day` require strict boolean values (true/false).

flags.name: --tender-job-schedule-shift
flags.description: Filter by tender job schedule shift ID

flags.name: --event-type
flags.validation: One of: arrive_site, start_work, stop_work, depart_site, at_site.

flags.name: --driver-day
flags.description: Filter by driver day (trucker shift set) ID

flags.name: --has-shift
flags.description: Filter by whether event has a shift (true/false)

flags.name: --most-recent-by-shift
flags.description: Filter to most recent event per shift (true/false)

flags.name: --most-recent-by-driver-day
flags.description: Filter to most recent event per driver day (true/false)
